IEEE Draft Standard Specifications for Maintenance and Test of Distributed Control Systems in Thermal Power Stations: Operation Service and Management

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The basic principles, items, methods, performance indicators, and acceptance requirements for the maintenance and testing of the distributed control systems (DCSs) of thermal power plants are specified. This standard is mainly applicable to the maintenance and testing of DCSs of conventional thermal power plants in commercial operation.
